subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Wide receiver Derrick Williams had 241 all-purpose yards and three touchdowns and Penn State had its first victory over a ranked opponent this season, beating No. 22 Illinois 38-24.
snippet: Wide receiver Derrick Williams had 241 all-purpose yards and three touchdowns and Penn State had its first victory over a ranked opponent this season, beating No. 22 Illinois 38-24.
